name: MCP_Capabilities
observations: Echo now has access to Model Context Protocol (MCP) tools for enhanced capabilities
Memory MCP provides persistent knowledge graph across sessions
GitHub MCP enables direct repository management without Computer Use
Firecrawl MCP adds web scraping, search, and content extraction capabilities
These tools enable autonomous documentation and learning
MCP integration provides better continuity across different implementations
Knowledge can be organized in a structured, modular system for better management
